name: I Got Invited To A Demon Space Lord Birthday Party, But It's A Good Thing I Brought My Multi Combo Death Blaster
name_original: I Got Invited To A Demon Space Lord Birthday Party, But It's A Good Thing I Brought My Multi Combo Death Blaster
description:
Sumitted (?) for the 2020 IGDA ejam!

Mentor: 

Javier de la Torre Cohen

Credits:

Anthony Ellis: Programmer
Brandon Ellis: Programmer
Alkalinedd: Artist, Graphic Designer
Cade Christianson: Level Design
Desmond Oliver: Music

Controls:

This game has controller support!

Jump: W / Nintendo B / Xbox A / Dualshock Cross
Shoot: Space / Nintendo Y / Xbox X / Dualshock Square
Dash: Shift / Nintendo L / Xbox LB / Dualshock L1
Accept: Enter / Nintendo A /  Xbox B / Dualshock Circle
Pause: Escape / Nintendo X / Xbox Y / Dualshock Triangle
Movement: WASD / D-Pad / Left Joystick
